raw_text: priorities: no weed + eat clean + gym only. simplifying.

[ADDICTION] Written at rock bottom - 245 lbs after 3 weeks of daily weed/LoL/poker. READ THIS WHEN YOU HAVE AN URGE: Even if there is a chance it would be enjoyable - weed will only bring me down and make me end up at the same rock bottom I have found myself many times. Energy and sleep get depleted. Weight hits ATH. Motivation and dopamine gone. There is no 'just a little.' Check the log - 0% success rate with moderation. The pain you forgot is real. You are reading this because your brain is lying to you.
Rock bottom day. Emotionally drained. Smoked and played league. But worked on the app and felt interest in AI again. Day zero - tomorrow is day one. It's going to be hard but sticking to it.

Consider how adding meditate section into the app would integrate with existing functionalities - reflections and trigger tracking already exist. Into meditation (Francis Lucille). How might this factor in?
When I give a suggestion - explore whether Claude should investigate and give a concise response on whether its a good idea vs just saving it for when Im at my keyboard
Idea: notifications should give a contextual response after looking things up instead of just saying saved/logged. Unsure if good idea - logged for later review.

OMAD today: one big meal around 3:00 PM. Around 5:30 PM I felt a strong crash (sleepy/tired). Unsure if from big meal vs weed recovery fatigue.

raw_text: Extremely important note - addictive personality goes 100% in everything including fitness then crashes back to binge mode. Need pattern recognition in app to identify this cycle.
